thread.section_title: 1000Bulbs.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of 1000Bulbs.com | www.1000bulbs.com
thread.title: Harriet Bush

author: Harriet Bush
title: Harriet Bush
text: This was my first use of the web page and found it easy to set up my account and to place my order. Because someone at the antique store had the "old" bulb, it took awhile to track down the bulb type I needed. This was more my being a novice at finding this bulb than any fault of the web page. I have just placed my order, so I'm looking forward to the packaging and delivery of my order.
